item.title: Demystifying Diffusion Models: Revolutionizing AI with Generative Power
item.author: Yu Jun Hao
item.description: Diffusion models start with 'noise' and, step by step, learn to remove it to reveal a coherent and detailed image, or in some cases, sounds or other types of data. This process, akin to an artist gradually refining a rough sketch into a detailed painting, is the essence of diffusion models.
